snippet: A boy and girl talking with other students in a Philadelphia high school gym were shot and wounded Friday, and up to three boys may have been involved in the shooting, the police said.
abstract: Boy and girl talking with other students in a Philadelphia high school gym are shot and wounded; up to three boys may have been involved in shooting; one boy is questioned and cleared, another turns himself in and third is still being sought; it is unclear if shooting was intentional.
lead_paragraph: A boy and girl talking with other students in a Philadelphia high school gym were shot and wounded Friday, and up to three boys may have been involved in the shooting, the police said.
